mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_PROD(order_id, order_date, member_id, addr_num, total_price) VALUES(#{order_id}, #{order_date}, #{member_id}, #{addr_num}, #{total_price})
mapper.select: SELECT P.prod_name, M.brand, S.opt_id1, S.opt_id2, S.opt_id3, S.opt_id4, S.opt_id5, OD.order_product_price, PI.img_id, OD.order_state FROM ORDER_DETAIL OD JOIN ORDER_PROD OP ON OD.order_id = OP.order_id JOIN SELLER_PROD_STOCK S ON OD.s_stock_id = S.s_stock_id JOIN PROD P ON S.prod_id = P.prod_id JOIN MEMBER M ON P.member_id = M.member_id JOIN PROD_IMAGE PI ON P.prod_id = PI.prod_id where OD.ORDER_ID = #{aa}
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDER_PROD SET order_state = 'cancelled' WHERE order_id = #{aa}
UPDATE ORDER_PROD SET order_state = 'refunded' WHERE order_id = #{aa}
